org.efaps.update.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.event.Event

  • public class Event
extends Object
    This class defines a Event to be connected with an update.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Event(String _name, EventType _event, String _program, String _method, String _index)
      Constructor of event for a trigger setting all instance variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(String _name,
     EventType _event,
     String _program,
     String _method,
     String _index)
        Constructor of event for a trigger setting all instance variables.
        Parameters:
        _name - name of the event (if null, the event itself is used as name)
        _event - event as defined in EventType
        _program - name of the program invoked in this trigger
        _method - name of the method to be invoked by this trigger (if null, method name execute is used)
        _index - index of the trigger

    • Method Detail

      • updateInDB

        public Instance updateInDB(Instance _instance,
                  String _typeName)
        For given type defined with the instance parameter, this trigger is searched by typeID and index position. If the trigger exists, the trigger is updated. Otherwise the trigger is created.
        Parameters:
        _instance - type instance to update with this attribute
        _typeName - name of the type to update
        Returns:
        Instance of the updated or inserted Trigger, null in case of error

      • addProperty

        public void addProperty(String _name,
               String _value)
        Adds a property to this event.
        Parameters:
        _name - name of the property
        _value - value of the property
        See Also:
        properties

      • getProperties

        public Map<String,String> getProperties()
        Returns all properties of this event.
        Returns:
        Map containing the properties
        See Also:
        properties
